typeSystemDescription.name: cTAKESTypeSystem
typeSystemDescription.description: This is a default Type System. It includes general types necessary to store annotations and interface with Protege

featureDescription.name: uid
featureDescription.description: Unique identifier of this annotation.

featureDescription.name: typeID
featureDescription.description: The type of named entity (e.g. drug, disorder, ...)

featureDescription.name: confidence
featureDescription.description: The confidence of the annotation.

featureDescription.name: sentenceID
featureDescription.description: contains the sentence id of the sentence that contains the NE's text span

featureDescription.name: drugMentionArr
featureDescription.description: holds drugMention annotations

featureDescription.name: oui
featureDescription.description: holds the rxnorm unique identifier for a given drug mention. TODO: change this attribute because of name clash (UMLS/SNOMED)

typeDescription.name: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.core.type.CopySrcAnnotation
typeDescription.description: Used for testing CopyAnnotator.

typeDescription.name: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.core.type.CopyDestAnnotation
typeDescription.description: Used for testing CopyAnnotator.

featureDescription.name: FORM
featureDescription.description: The lexical item itself.

featureDescription.name: POSTAG
featureDescription.description: Part of speech for the lexical item.

featureDescription.name: DEPREL
featureDescription.description: Label/type/relation for dependency edges.

featureDescription.name: ID
featureDescription.description: Intra-sentential index of the token. Root begins at 0.

featureDescription.name: DEPREL
featureDescription.description: Label/type/relation for dependency edges.

featureDescription.name: CPOSTAG
featureDescription.description: A coarser POS tag.

featureDescription.name: FEATS
featureDescription.description: Unordered features delimited by the pipe `|' symbol.

featureDescription.name: PHEAD
featureDescription.description: Projective head -- following these edges enforces projectivity, but may not always be present.

featureDescription.name: PDEPREL
featureDescription.description: Dependency label for projective-only edges.

featureDescription.name: LEMMA
featureDescription.description: Normalized version of the lexeme FORM.

typeDescription.name: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.drugner.type.FrequencyAnnotation
typeDescription.description: The frequency determination for the Drug NER profile.

typeDescription.name: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.drugner.type.DurationAnnotation
typeDescription.description: The duration determination for the Drug NER profile.

typeDescription.name: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.drugner.type.RouteAnnotation
typeDescription.description: The route determination for the Drug NER profile.

featureDescription.name: intakeMethod
featureDescription.description: Means by which the drug was taken.

typeDescription.name: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.drugner.type.SuffixStrengthAnnotation
typeDescription.description: The suffix portion of dosage strength determination for the Drug NER profile.

typeDescription.name: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.drugner.type.FractionStrengthAnnotation
typeDescription.description: The fraction portion of dosages strength determination for the Drug NER profile.

typeDescription.name: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.drugner.type.RangeStrengthAnnotation
typeDescription.description: The range portion of dosages stength determination for the Drug NER profile.

typeDescription.name: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.drugner.type.DecimalStrengthAnnotation
typeDescription.description: The decimal portion of dosages stength determination for the Drug NER profile.

typeDescription.name: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.drugner.type.DrugChangeStatusAnnotation
typeDescription.description: The change status of dosages determination for the Drug NER profile.

featureDescription.name: changeStatus
featureDescription.description: Indicates the drug change status of 'stop', 'start', 'increase', 'decrease', or 'noChange'.

typeDescription.name: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.drugner.type.DosagesAnnotation
typeDescription.description: The dosage determination for the Drug NER profile.

typeDescription.name: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.drugner.type.StrengthAnnotation
typeDescription.description: Holds the value representing the unit of the drug dosage.

typeDescription.name: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.drugner.type.FrequencyUnitAnnotation
typeDescription.description: The value represents the unit portion of the drug frequency.

featureDescription.name: period
featureDescription.description: The periodic unit used, e.g day, month, hour, etc.

typeDescription.name: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.drugner.type.FormAnnotation
typeDescription.description: The value represents the form portion of the drug mention.

featureDescription.name: subSectionBodyBegin
featureDescription.description: Sub-section body begin offset.

featureDescription.name: subSectionBodyEnd
featureDescription.description: Sub-section body end offset.

featureDescription.name: status
featureDescription.description: Status of 'possible', 'history of', or 'family history of'.

featureDescription.name: subSectionHeaderBegin
featureDescription.description: Begin offset of subSection header

featureDescription.name: subSectionHeaderEnd
featureDescription.description: Ending offset of subsection header

featureDescription.name: parentSectionId
featureDescription.description: The section in which the subsection was found.

featureDescription.name: confidence
featureDescription.description: The confidence of the annotation.

featureDescription.name: frequency
featureDescription.description: Frequency refers to how often the patient needs to take the drug. Frequency is divided into frequency number and frequency unit. E.g. twice daily

featureDescription.name: duration
featureDescription.description: Duration refers to for how long the patient is expected to take the drug. E.g. 'for 2 weeks' Strongly encouraged to use bold text

featureDescription.name: route
featureDescription.description: Medication route refers to the way that a drug is introduced into the body. E.g oral Strongly encouraged to use bold text

featureDescription.name: drugChangeStatus
featureDescription.description: Status refers to the whether the medication is currently being taken or not.

featureDescription.name: dosage
featureDescription.description: Dosage refers to how many of each drug the patient is taking. E.g. 5 mg

featureDescription.name: form
featureDescription.description: Form refers to the physical appearance of the drug. E.g. cream

typeDescription.name: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.drugner.type.DrugLookupWindowAnnotation
typeDescription.description: Similar to LookupWindowAnnotation however, these annotations are restricted to the segments/sections specified in the parameter - sectionOverrideSet - in DrugCNP2LookupWindow

featureDescription.name: hitDictionaryValue
featureDescription.description: Value from the Dictionary that was successfully looked up

featureDescription.name: isStandAlone
featureDescription.description: Identifies weather this term needs another dictionary hit to be considered as a valid hit. Currently this is being used for Unstable Angina which requires "Term" and "Location" to be present in the text to be considered as a valid hit. Valid values are 0 and 1. Where, 0 is false (not standalone) and 1 is true (is standalone)

featureDescription.name: relatedTokens
featureDescription.description: identifies the token that this PADTerm spans

featureDescription.name: hitDictionaryValue
featureDescription.description: Value from the Dictionary that was successfully looked up

featureDescription.name: isStandAlone
featureDescription.description: Identifies weather this term needs another dictionary hit to be considered as a valid hit. Currently this is being used for Unstable Angina which requires "Term" and "Location" to be present in the text to be considered as a valid hit. Valid values are 0 and 1. Where, 0 is false (not standalone) and 1 is true (is standalone)

featureDescription.name: relatedTokens
featureDescription.description: identifies the token that this PADTerm spans

typeDescription.name: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.pad.type.PADHit
typeDescription.description: Would represent one of the following Term (in the case of a stand alone term) Term + Location Location + term

typeDescription.name: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.drugner.type.StrengthAnnotation
typeDescription.description: Holds the value representing the unit of the drug dosage.

typeDescription.description: The value represents the unit portion of the drug frequency.

featureDescription.description: The periodic unit used, e.g day, month, hour, etc.

typeDescription.description: The value represents the form portion of the drug mention.

featureDescription.description: Sub-section body begin offset.

featureDescription.name: subSectionBodyEnd
featureDescription.description: Sub-section body end offset.

featureDescription.name: status
featureDescription.description: Status of 'possible', 'history of', or 'family history of'.

featureDescription.description: Begin offset of subSection header

featureDescription.name: confidence
featureDescription.description: The confidence of the annotation.

featureDescription.name: frequency
featureDescription.description: Frequency refers to how often the patient needs to take the drug. Frequency is divided into frequency number and frequency unit. E.g. twice daily

featureDescription.name: duration
featureDescription.description: Duration refers to for how long the patient is expected to take the drug. E.g. 'for 2 weeks' Strongly encouraged to use bold text

featureDescription.name: route

typeDescription.name: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.lookup.type.DrugLookupWindowAnnotation
typeDescription.description: Similar to LookupWindowAnnotation however, these annotations are restricted to the segments/sections specified in the parameter - sectionOverrideSet - in DrugCNP2LookupWindow

featureDescription.name: sideEffect
featureDescription.description: side effect mention in NamedEntity

featureDescription.name: sentence
featureDescription.description: sentence containing side effect

typeDescription.name: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.sideeffect.type.PSESentence
typeDescription.description: sentence(s) that contains potential side effect and causing drug

typeDescription.name: edu.mayo.bmi.smoking.i2b2.type.RecordSentence
typeDescription.description: Represents a single sentence from an I2B2 record.

featureDescription.name: recordID
featureDescription.description: ID of record that this sentence belongs to.

featureDescription.name: classification
featureDescription.description: Smoking status classification for the given sentence.

featureDescription.name: recordTextBegin
featureDescription.description: Begin offset of the sentence relative to the entire record text.

featureDescription.name: recordTextEnd
featureDescription.description: End offset of the sentence relative to the entire record text.

typeDescription.name: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.libsvm.type.NumericAttributeValue
typeDescription.description: Corresponds to the ARFF numeric attributes.

typeDescription.name: edu.mayo.bmi.smoking.i2b2.type.RecordSentence
typeDescription.description: Represents a single sentence from an I2B2 record.

featureDescription.name: recordID
featureDescription.description: ID of record that this sentence belongs to.

featureDescription.name: classification
featureDescription.description: Smoking status classification for the given sentence.

featureDescription.name: recordTextBegin
featureDescription.description: Begin offset of the sentence relative to the entire record text.

featureDescription.name: recordTextEnd
featureDescription.description: End offset of the sentence relative to the entire record text.

typeDescription.name: edu.mayo.bmi.smoking.type.SmokingDocumentClassification
typeDescription.description: Represents classification related to the document

featureDescription.name: classification
featureDescription.description: represents the document level classification that RecordResolutionAnnotator assigns

featureDescription.name: recordID
featureDescription.description: Represents the document record id

featureDescription.name: sideEffect
featureDescription.description: side effect mention in NamedEntity

featureDescription.name: sentence
featureDescription.description: sentence containing side effect

typeDescription.description: sentence(s) that contains potential side effect and causing drug
